release.action: Improved consistency for handling of null values for link template variables: when calling #createLink on a client proxy you'll always get the link template (which may be partially expanded if some values were not null in the invocation). When following such links, the template will be fully resolved before loading the target resource.
Improved reliability when parsing max-age response header.

Simplified generics in signature of HalApiReturnTypeSupport#convertToObservable. The change is binary compatible at runtime, but (only) if you are implementing your own HalApiReturnTypeSupport, you may see a build error after upgrading the compile time dependency.
Added functions in builder to specify custom ObjectMapper (to avoid jackson-datatype-guava dependency).
Allow methods annotated with Related to return Link instances directly.
Introduce RhymeMetadataConfiguration to opt-in for generation of embedded "rhyme:metadata" resource.
Introduced a simpler SPI interface for custom HTTP client implementations.
